hadiths.text: Ibn 'abbas said:"The Messenger of Allah said: 'Perform Hajj and 'Umrah consecutively; for they remove poverty and sin as the bellows removes impurity from iron

chapter.ara-name: باب فَضْلِ الْمُتَابَعَةِ بَيْنَ الْحَجِّ وَالْعُمْرَةِ
chapter.eng-name: the virtue or Performing Hajj and 'Umrah Consecutively
